name: #TeamSeas Turbo
description:
The adorable likenesses of Jimmy (aka "Mr. Beast") and Mark Rober have joined a race to scoop up as much trash as possible before the finish line, but watch out for the rocks!

How to Play

A and D - Move Left and Right
Left/Right Arrow Keys - Scoop trash on the Left and Right sides
Spacebar - Retry level
Escape - Quit Game

Play both roles yourself, or in the spirit of teamwork, have a friend take over one of the sets of controls.

More to see on YouTube

"Making of" Video - COMING SOON
Our Channel - CommandV

made for #SeaJam

Please note that...

  • The game might run slowly on older PCs; closing other programs may help.
  • The game was designed to present a difficult but achievable challenge. Best of luck!
